content: pride rainbow pussy hat beadedwire etsy com judystalus etsy com 1 instructions are for making a pride pussy hat in a traditional rainbow but you can easily make a different pride hat just change the colors - you may only need a few stripes making it even easier the second photo shows the hat in the genderqueer flag colors you can make the hat with any worsted weight yarn i make two versions - one in acrylic and one in cotton the only problem in substituting wool or another fiber is that it can be hard to get all the colors you want materials lily sugar and cream cotton yarn approximately 200 yards total in red orange yellow green blue and purple or colors of your choice or lionbrand vanna s choice size j crochet hook size i crochet hook tapestry needle 2 open stitch marker or safety pin gauge approximately 12 half_double_crochet in four inches size you can easily change the hat size for this simple hat an average size for a head about 22 inches in circumference measured around the top of the nape of your neck and around just above the forehead basically where the hat band would lay hat begins with a chain of 66 stitches fewer stitches for a small 60 and more for a large 74 abbreviations chain - chain single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet directions round 1 with size j hook and red and leaving a tail about 8 inches long ch66 for a medium size hat see size note above turn half_double_crochet into the bottom of the second chain from the hook and the bottom of each chain across you are working into the little bump at the bottom of the chain don t turn join the last half_double_crochet to the first half_double_crochet with a slip_stitch use the tail to sew the two stitches together neatly round 2 ch1 half_double_crochet in the same stitch and every stitch around join last half_double_crochet to first half_double_crochet with a slip_stitch don t turn round 3 repeat round 2 bind off and sew in tails round 4 with orange slip_stitch into any stitch ch1 half_double_crochet in the same stitch and every stitch around join last half_double_crochet to first half_double_crochet with a slip_stitch don t turn rounds 5-6 repeat rounds 2 and 3 rounds 7-9 with yellow repeat rounds 4-6 rounds 10-12 with green repeat rounds 4-6 rounds 13-15 with blue repeat rounds 4-6 round 16 change to hook i with purple slip_stitch into any stitch and single_crochet in the same stitch place stitch marker or safety pin in this stitch single_crochet in every stitch around do not join or turn at the end of the round round 17 single_crochet into marked stitch and move the marker to this new stitch single_crochet in every stitch around do not join or turn at the end of the round 3 rounds 18- 20 repeat round 17 bind off at the end of the round -
